examples: The neighbor's dog barking throughout the night is a right nuisance - I'm going to complain.
What a nuisance to have to go now!

definitions.definition: A person or thing causing annoyance or inconvenience .
examples: You can be such a nuisance when you don't get your way.

definitions.definition: Anything harmful or offensive to the community or to a member of it, for which a legal remedy exists.

secondary_definitions: A person or thing causing annoyance or inconvenience .
( law ) Anything harmful or offensive to the community or to a member of it, for which a legal remedy exists.
